sense.def:
To have sympathy for someone
pomeni, da se nam smili nekdo, ki se mu je zgodilo nekaj neprijetnega ali hudega, in da to pokažemo s svojim vedênjem.

seg.quote: People feel immediate sympathy for a man left alone with his children.

sense.def:
To have sympathy with someone's ideas or opinions
pomeni strinjati se z mislimi ali mnenjem nekoga.

seg.quote: On that point I'm in sympathy with Mr McCabe.

sense.def:
Someone's sympathies
je odobravanje in podpiranje nekega predloga ali ukrepa.

seg.quote: He knows I have strong left-wing sympathies.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj naredimo
in sympathy with someone
, želimo s tem pokazati, da nekoga podpiramo.

seg.quote: They were carrying out a hunger strike in sympathy with mine.
